segments.text: Good morning , sir . Have a seat please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to know the state of the residential property market right now because I have an apartment to sell .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , here is my business card . I'm James Wilson . Let me explain to you how things are . In recent months , the demand for residential properties has become extremely high . The price of residential properly has risen almost twenty percent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Since I have to go back to England within the next few months , I would like to sell my apartment as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , sir . I think it's a seller's market right now . Let me get down some information about your apartment first . what is your property's address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Flat C . 15 / F , Tong House , Tai Koo Shing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the square footage of your property ? How many bedrooms and living rooms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Its gross area is approximately nine hundred square feet . There's one living room , one dining room , one master bedroom and two other bedrooms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the orientation and view ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It faces south with a hillside view .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The market price for Tong House is around five thousand Hong Kong dollars per square foot , but it also depends on the internal layout and condition of the house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to ask for four point five million Hong Kong dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name and contact number , Sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Johnson , and my contact number is 2876543 2 . My office number is 2123456 7 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Johnson . May I ask you one more question ? When will your property become available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In about one month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Also , Mr . Johnson , I would like to remind you my company will charge a commission equivalent to one percent of the transaction price in the event of a successful selling of the property through our introduction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . I will introduce your property to our clients . When they want to see your property , I will give you a call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
